name: morsecode
description: - Create a user interface that allows the user to either input some English text or some Morse Code - Create JS functions that would allow the user to translate their English text into Morse Code or Morse Code into English text - Make sure to handle spaces properly (ie. there is 1 space between English words, but one space between Morse Code characters) - Write tests for all functions that don't interact with the dom - Give users feedback when something goes wrong
